Welcome to Izza’s documentation!¶

Deployment & Documentation & Stats

Build Status & Coverage & Maintainability & License

Izza is machine learning Python toolkit. It mainly implements tools for assessing cluster tendency. Cluster tendency is about discovering the existence of cluster’s in multivariate data. (link to wikipedia)

Note on Python 2.7:

The python package is not available in python 2 and only tested on Linux for the moments.

API Demo:

from sklearn import datasets
from izza.metrics import hopkins

X = datasets.load_iris().data
hopkins(X,150)

Key Links and Resources:
